text.text_translated: Older horror films often show protagonists in very difficult situations, and it is hard or impossible for them to call for help or call the police. Mobile phones have made that situation a little less believable now. What is the solution to keep the suspense? No phone signal! If you are a hero in a horror film, something will probably go wrong. At a key moment, when you need to call for help, you will have no signal at all. Or the phone’s battery will die while the character is making the call, or both.
